text: Sakalo manuhara eta'i um'mata achila. Tara pichata allahe nabisakalaka susambadadata arau satarkakarairaupe praerana karaile arau te'omlokara lagata satyasaha kitaba aratirna karaile yate manuhe yibora bisayata matabheda karaichila se'ibora mimansa karaiba parae; arau yisakalaka e'ito diya haichila, spasta nidarsana sihamtara ocarata ahara pichato kerala paraspara bidbesabasata se'i bisayata sihamte biraodhita karaichila. Tara pichata allahe te'omra icchakrame imandarasakalaka se'i satya bisayata hidayata karaiche, yi bisaye sihamte matanaikya srsti karaichila; arau allahe yaka iccha sarala pathara phale hidayata karae
